alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 10:01AM CDT until August 29 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND...NORTHWESTERN WHITESIDE...SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...NORTHEASTERN SCOTT AND EASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 1001 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Andover to near McCausland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Andover, Camp Miss-Elk-Ton, Teeds Grove and Bryant around 1005 AM CDT. Clinton, Fulton, Bulgers Hollow and Elvira around 1010 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Camanche, Thomson, Rock Creek Marina and Campground, Rock Creek Park, Thomson Causeway, Albany, Argo Fay, Ideal, Garden Plain, Fairhaven, East Clinton, Newton Corners, Franklin Corners, Chadwick, White Pigeon, Coleta, Union Grove, Ustick and Fenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
